article_title: NBC-2.com WBBH News for Fort Myers, Cape Coral & Naples, Florida
article_text: A North Carolina photographer captured a special moment between a U.S. Marine and his bride on their wedding day and now it's going viral.The photo was taken by Dwayne Schmidt Photography and has been shared and liked thousands of times since it was posted on Facebook over the weekend.The powerful photo shows the couple holding hands as they say a prayer.
